sentences.english: If Rexroth was the founding father, Madeline Gleason was the founding mother.
sentences.chinese: 如果力士乐是开国元勋，麦德兰格里森是创始母亲。

sentences.english: Note the distinction here, evidence of the wisdom of the founding fathers.
sentences.chinese: 注意两者的区别，这也体现了建国元勋们的智慧。

sentences.english: Liu can become the village in the village of hero, swing-up spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 刘能成了村里的元勋，在村里摆起谱来。

sentences.english: Our founders believed in universal values.
sentences.chinese: 美国的开国元勋们相信共同价值。
